alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 2:11PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Judith Basin and west central Fergus Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 209 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Hobson, or 17 miles east of Stanford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rain or snow. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danvers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap
